attributes.review: I dislike this app very much that I can’t even explain and my share my thoughts in words!!😤
attributes.title: This app needs to be taken down ASAP

attributes.review: Beware this app will run you for your pockets, I came home to find the app stealing my hamster, like that’s my hamster mind you it’s a Wednesday afternoon, the sun is shining and the app kidnapped my baby👁👄👁
attributes.title: This deserves a zero star

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app it started glitching. My phone started to do and say all types of stupid. IT EVEN TURNED ORANGE. I am here to say that we will not go down like this. #Tiktok Lives Matter
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: I didn’t have high hopes going into this app but as to be expected it’s bad. Like real bad. The whole last 4 years have been bad but this app is like the peak.
attributes.title: Not good

attributes.review: I don’t know what happened but it wouldn’t let me go in the app it just kicked me out again and again I wonder why?
attributes.title: Kicked me out

attributes.review: no words. i have no words for how truly awful this app is. it is so slow and has permanently impacted my phone’s reaction speed. highly do not recommend.
attributes.title: HORRENDOUS

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and immediately something went wrong with my phone. It started glitching and shut down randomly at one point. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
attributes.title: AWFUL APP

attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch and shut down. Do not get it unless you want your phone to break!!
attributes.title: This app is horrible! Worst ever!

attributes.review: This stupid app stole my fridge and ate my dinosaur nuggets. This app is useless and it calls my pet chair a poo poo head. Like how rude is that. This app literally is on x games mode of being rude. If this could be the CEO of something, it would be the CEO of hating on tictoc.
attributes.title: WORST APP

attributes.review: if i could give 0 stars... i would. if trump feels like trying to OPRESS gen z by taking away a HUGE part of their free speech (tiktok) then who is he to have his own app? THIS IS CENSOR SHIP!!! I have rights and violating then is not going to make america great.
attributes.title: DISGUSTANG
